DOC.brief_summary: To verify superiority celecoxib ( YM177 ) 200 mg bid placebo treatment patient low back pain well non-inferiority loxoprofen sodium 60 mg tid .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Of Celecoxib 200 Mg Bid , Loxoprofen Sodium 60 Mg Tid And Placebo In Low Back Pain In Japan
DOC.criteria: Patients major site low back pain 12th thoracic vertebra low Patients low back pain least two week Patients previous history complication rheumatoid arthritis , spondylarthrosis negative serum reaction ( ankylose spondylarthritis , psoriatic arthritis ) , metastasis tumor , Paget 's disease , fibromyalgia , tumor infection spinal cord intervertebral disc , disease cause systemic pain
